title: Foley's Death Highlights Plight Of Journalists In Syria
teaser: American photojournalist James Foley was killed this past week by militants from the Islamic State. Tess Vigeland speaks with Robert Mahoney, deputy director of the Committee to Protect Journalists, about the targeting of journalists in Syria.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
